sense.gloss: to turn toward, to look (up, down, etc.)
to face (e.g. east) (of a building, window, etc.), to look out on, to front (on)
to point (of an arrow, compass needle, etc.)
to be suited to, to be fit for
to go towards, to turn to (of one's interests, feelings, etc.), to be inclined (to do)

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓がそこに↑出|向↑↓でむ↓く|↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓がありますか。
sdata.e: Do I need to go there?

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓がそこに↑出|向↑↓でむ↓く|↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓がありますか。
sdata.e: Is there any need for me to go there?

sdata.j: ↑振↑↓ふ↓り|↑向↑↓む↓く|なよ、なにが↑見↑↓み↓えるかは↑見当↑↓けんとう↓つくんだから。
sdata.e: Don't look back cause you know what you might see.

sdata.j: ↑足↑↓あし↓の|↑向↑↓む↓く|ままに↑歩↑↓ある↓いた。
sdata.e: We let our legs do the leading.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑方↑↓ほう↓を↑振↑↓ふ↓り|↑向↑↓む↓く|とニヤリと↑笑↑↓わら↓った。
sdata.e: He looked back at me and grinned.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓が↑振↑↓ふ↓り|↑向↑↓む↓く|と、↑誰↑↓だれ↓かが↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓のあとをつけてきているのがわかった。
sdata.e: She turned around and saw someone was following her.

sdata.j: ↑北↑↓きた↓を|↑向↑↓む↓く|と、↑東↑↓ひがし↓は↑右側↑↓みぎがわ↓になる。
sdata.e: If you face north, the east is on your right.
